channel.title: Skins
channel.description: Can someone help me get a skin for my character, because im bored of Steve.

item.title: Skins
item.dc:creator: @Troller21 Troller21
item.description:
@Troller21 wrote:

I dont have it yet, but im getting it for my birthday that is coming up soon, so i will get a skin and join the moparcraft server! :eek:

item.title: Skins
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:6, topic:435013”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=537733.msg3933086#msg3933086 date=1330839108]
Or CoonHunter uses his java powers to redirect skin loading to another database like he did before and we use that client so everyone can have skins.

But, there’s no point in downloading another minecraft for people who paid for it already. (Probably a MITB argument)
[/quote]already exists.[/quote]
He didn’t say that it doesn’t exist, he said he wouldn’t download it. I personally have that mod and capecraft installed for the sake of others. I hate having the ‘do you like my skin’ conversations with people to use that mod when I don’t have it installed.

Read full topic

item.title: Skins
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

As far as I’m aware there isn’t a fully functioning way to change your skin for everybody else to see if you haven’t paid for Minecraft, I believe there are programs you can install and if others have them installed they can see your skin.

But if you’ve bought MC, just use sites like: http://www.minecraftskins.com/

Read full topic
